analysis.description:
Daocoin.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/28/0xd7522fb7431a7e9a408954fee58c2ba2078da6db.sol#242-253) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1

Daocoin.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/28/0xd7522fb7431a7e9a408954fee58c2ba2078da6db.sol#242-253) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
Daocoin.getProofOfStakeReward (/unique_chucks/28/0xd7522fb7431a7e9a408954fee58c2ba2078da6db.sol#253-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
